snippet: An envelope addressed to Senator Roger Wicker of Mississippi showed positive results for the toxin in tests at a mail facility in Washington. It was sent to the F.B.I. for more analysis.
abstract: Envelope addressed to Sen Roger Wicker of Mississippi tests positive for poison ricin, adding to security concerns in Capitol following Boston Marathon bombing.

byline.contributor: Michael S. Schmidt, Jeremy W. Peters and Ashley Parker contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: An envelope addressed to Senator Roger Wicker of Mississippi showed positive results for the toxin in tests at a mail facility in Washington. It was sent to the F.B.I. for more analysis.

headline.seo: Ricin Detected in Letter Sent to Senator Roger Wicker
headline.main: Letter Mailed to Senator Tests Positive for Ricin
headline.print_headline: Toxic Ricin Is Detected in Letter Mailed to Senator
